alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued April 06 at 6:53PM EDT until April 06 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 103 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHWEST NORTH CAROLINA CHEROKEE IN TENNESSEE THIS WATCH INCLUDES 19 COUNTIES IN EAST TENNESSEE ANDERSON BLOUNT BRADLEY CLAIBORNE GRAINGER HAMBLEN HAMILTON HANCOCK HAWKINS JEFFERSON KNOX LOUDON MCMINN MEIGS MONROE POLK ROANE SEVIER UNION THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALCOA, ALPHA, ANDREWS, ARCHVILLE, ARTHUR, ATHENS, BEAN STATION, BEARDEN, BENTON, BIG SPRING, BRADBURY, BULLET CREEK, CHATTANOOGA, CHESTNUT HILL, CLAIRFIELD, CLEAR WATER, CLEVELAND, CLINTON, CONASAUGA, DANDRIDGE, DENTVILLE, EAGLE FURNACE, ELKMONT, ETOWAH, EVANSTON, FAIRVIEW, HAPPY VALLEY, HARRIMAN, HARRISBURG, HARROGATE-SHAWANEE, HIAWASSE DAM, HOWARD QUARTER, JEFFERSON CITY, KINGSTON, KNOXVILLE, KODAK, KYLES FORD, LAKE FOREST, LENOIR CITY, LONE MOUNTAIN, LOUDON, LUTTRELL, MADISONVILLE, MARBLE, MARYVILLE, MAYNARDVILLE, MCMAHAN, MOORESBURG, MORRISTOWN, MURPHY, NORRIS LAKE, OAK RIDGE, OLIVER SPRINGS, PARKSVILLE, PAULETTE, PIGEON FORGE, RELIANCE, ROCKWOOD, ROSE HILL, RUSSELLVILLE, SANDLICK, SEVIERVILLE, SEYMOUR, SHARPS CHAPEL, SNEEDVILLE, SPRINGDALE, STRAWBERRY PLAINS, SWEETWATER, TASSO, TOPTON, TREADWAY, UNAKA, VIOLET, AND WHITE PINE.
